description: This file implements authentication API endpoints using FastAPI. It includes routes for login, token refresh, and Google OAuth sign-in, along with helper functions for constructing responses.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: Schema for authentication response containing tokens and user info.

classes.name: GoogleLoginRequest
classes.description: Schema for Google login request payload.

classes.name: RefreshRequest
classes.description: Schema for token refresh request payload.

classes.name: TokenPair
classes.description: Schema representing a pair of access and refresh tokens.

methods.name: AuthResponse _build_auth_response(user: User, access: str, refresh: str)
methods.description: Helper function to construct an AuthResponse object with tokens and user info.

methods.name: AuthResponse login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate user via email and password, returning tokens.

methods.name: AuthResponse refresh_tokens(payload: RefreshRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to refresh tokens given a valid refresh token.

methods.name: AuthResponse google_sign_in(payload: GoogleLoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), settings: Settings = Depends(get_settings))
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate via Google ID token, creating a user if necessary.

ctags.name: _build_auth_response
ctags.pattern: /^def _build_auth_response(user: User, access: str, refresh: str) -> AuthResponse:$/

ctags.name: google_sign_in
ctags.pattern: /^def google_sign_in(payload: GoogleLoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), settings: Setting/
ctags.signature: (payload: GoogleLoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), settings: Settings = Depends(get_settings))

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> AuthResponse:$/

ctags.name: refresh_tokens
ctags.pattern: /^def refresh_tokens(payload: RefreshRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> AuthResponse:$/
